General.Name: MCE Holdings Bhd
General.Description: MCE Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, designs, manufactures, and sells automotive electronics and mechatronics parts in Malaysia. It operates in two segments, Automotive Parts and Healthcare Services. The company offers ultrasonic parking sensor systems, such as distant parking sensors and display units, and digital and passive type parking sensors; functional instrument panel switches comprising IP, power window, hazard, and mirror switches, as well as switch pack consoles and assy controls; and window lifter systems, including double and single rail, cross arm/scissors, regulator double, and single arm types. It also provides interior and exterior lamp, and PCBA lighting systems; camera systems; anti-theft keyless entry systems; ignition key set systems, such as key fob and holders, lock steering handles, and door cylinders; and others comprising driver assistance systems, USB and wireless chargers, driving video recorders, reflective type HUD products, and tire pressure monitoring systems. In addition, the company offers sunroof dummy and cover, top housing frame, speaker frame, vehicle reading cover and top cover, pulley and cable holder, license plate housing frame reflector and sunroof housing, panel center, switch panel, corner panel, and handle fix automotive plastic components. Further, it trades in spare parts; and provides healthcare services. MCE Holdings Berhad was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
